summary:
Kansas City is the biggest city in Missouri by population and size. It's in Jackson County but also spreads into nearby counties. With over 500,000 people, it's the 37th largest city in the U.S. Founded in the 1830s near the Missouri and Kansas Rivers, it was originally called Kansas, but later changed to Kansas City to avoid confusion with Kansas Territory.

The city covers over 300 square miles and has many neighborhoods and suburbs. It's known for its jazz, theater, fountains, sports teams, and delicious food like barbecue and steak.
title: Kansas City, Missouri
